00054 
00055 void Op_Diff_PolyMAC_Face::completer()
00056 {
00057   Op_Diff_PolyMAC_base::completer();
00058   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00059   const Champ_Face_PolyMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_Face_PolyMAC, equation().inconnue().valeur());
00060   if (zone.zone().nb_joints() && zone.zone().joint(0).epaisseur() < 1)
00061     Cerr << "Op_Diff_PolyMAC_Face : largeur de joint insuffisante (minimum 1)!" << finl, Process::exit();
00062   ch.init_ra(), zone.init_rf(), zone.init_m1(), zone.init_m2();
00063 
00064   if (que_suis_je() == "Op_Diff_PolyMAC_Face") return;
00065   const RefObjU& modele_turbulence = equation().get_modele(TURBULENCE);
00066   const Mod_turb_hyd_base& mod_turb = ref_cast(Mod_turb_hyd_base,modele_turbulence.valeur());
00067   const Champ_Fonc& alpha_t = mod_turb.viscosite_turbulente();
00068   associer_diffusivite_turbulente(alpha_t);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void Op_Diff_PolyMAC_Face::dimensionner(Matrice_Morse& mat) const
00072 {
00073   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00074   const Champ_Face_PolyMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_Face_PolyMAC, equation().inconnue().valeur());
00075   const IntTab& e_f = zone.elem_faces();
00076   int i, j, k, a, e, f, fb, nf_tot = zone.nb_faces_tot(), na_tot = dimension < 3 ? zone.zone().nb_som_tot() : zone.zone().nb_aretes_tot(), idx;
00077 
00078   zone.init_m2();
00079 
00080   IntTab stencil(0, 2);
00081   stencil.set_smart_resize(1);
00082 // partie vitesses : m2 Rf
00083   for (e = 0; e < zone.nb_elem_tot(); e++) for (i = zone.m2d(e), idx = 0; i < zone.m2d(e + 1); i++, idx++)
00084       for (f = e_f(e, idx), j = zone.m2i(i); f < zone.nb_faces() && ch.icl(f, 0) < 2 && j < zone.m2i(i + 1); j++)
00085         for (fb = e_f(e, zone.m2j(j)), k = zone.rfdeb(fb); k < zone.rfdeb(fb + 1); k++) stencil.append_line(f, nf_tot + zone.rfji(k));
00086 
00087 // partie vorticites : Ra m2 - m1 / nu
00088   for (a = 0; a < (dimension < 3 ? zone.nb_som() : zone.zone().nb_aretes()); a++)
00089     {
00090       for (i = ch.radeb(a, 0); i < ch.radeb(a + 1, 0); i++) stencil.append_line(nf_tot + a, ch.raji(i));
00091       for (i = zone.m1deb(a); i < zone.m1deb(a + 1); i++) stencil.append_line(nf_tot + a, nf_tot + zone.m1ji(i, 0));
00092     }
00093 
00094   tableau_trier_retirer_doublons(stencil);
00095   Matrix_tools::allocate_morse_matrix(nf_tot + na_tot, nf_tot + na_tot, stencil, mat);
00096 }
00097 
00098 // ajoute la contribution de la convection au second membre resu
00099 // renvoie resu
00100 inline DoubleTab& Op_Diff_PolyMAC_Face::ajouter(const DoubleTab& inco, DoubleTab& resu) const
00101 {
00102   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00103   const IntTab& f_e = zone.face_voisins(), &e_f = zone.elem_faces();
00104   const Champ_Face_PolyMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_Face_PolyMAC, equation().inconnue().valeur());
00105   const Conds_lim& cls = la_zcl_poly_.valeur().les_conditions_limites();
00106   const DoubleVect& pe = zone.porosite_elem(), &ve = zone.volumes();
00107   int i, j, k, e, f, fb, a, nf_tot = zone.nb_faces_tot(), idx;
00108 
00109   update_nu();
00110 // partie vitesses : m2 Rf
00111   for (e = 0; e < zone.nb_elem_tot(); e++) for (i = zone.m2d(e), idx = 0; i < zone.m2d(e + 1); i++, idx++)
00112       for (f = e_f(e, idx), j = zone.m2i(i); f < zone.nb_faces() && ch.icl(f, 0) < 2 && j < zone.m2i(i + 1); j++)
00113         for (fb = e_f(e, zone.m2j(j)), k = zone.rfdeb(fb); k < zone.rfdeb(fb + 1); k++)
00114           resu(f) -= zone.m2c(j) * ve(e) * (e == f_e(f, 0) ? 1 : -1) * (e == f_e(fb, 0) ? 1 : -1) * pe(e) * zone.rfci(k) * inco(nf_tot + zone.rfji(k));
00115 
00116 // partie vorticites : Ra m2 - m1 / nu
00117   if (resu.dimension_tot(0) == nf_tot) return resu; //resu ne contient que la partie "faces"
00118   for (a = 0; a < (dimension < 3 ? zone.nb_som() : zone.zone().nb_aretes()); a++)
00119     {
00120 // rotationnel : vitesses internes
00121       for (i = ch.radeb(a, 0); i < ch.radeb(a + 1, 0); i++)
00122         resu(nf_tot + a) -= ch.raci(i) * inco(ch.raji(i));
00123 // rotationnel : vitesses aux bords
00124       for (i = ch.radeb(a, 1); i < ch.radeb(a + 1, 1); i++) for (k = 0; k < dimension; k++)
00125           resu(nf_tot + a) -= ch.racf(i, k) * ref_cast(Dirichlet, cls[ch.icl(ch.rajf(i), 1)].valeur()).val_imp(ch.icl(ch.rajf(i), 2), k);
00126 // -m1 / nu
00127       for (i = zone.m1deb(a); i < zone.m1deb(a + 1); i++)
00128         resu(nf_tot + a) += zone.m1ci(i) / (pe(zone.m1ji(i, 1)) * nu_(zone.m1ji(i, 1), 0)) * inco(nf_tot + zone.m1ji(i, 0));
00129     }
00130   return resu;
00131 }
00132 
00133 //
00134 //! on assemble la matrice.
00135 
00136 inline void Op_Diff_PolyMAC_Face::contribuer_a_avec(const DoubleTab& inco, Matrice_Morse& matrice) const
00137 {
00138   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone = la_zone_poly_.valeur();
00139   const IntTab& f_e = zone.face_voisins(), &e_f = zone.elem_faces();
00140   const Champ_Face_PolyMAC& ch = ref_cast(Champ_Face_PolyMAC, equation().inconnue().valeur());
00141   const DoubleVect& pe = zone.porosite_elem(), &ve = zone.volumes();
00142   int i, j, k, e, f, fb, a, nf_tot = zone.nb_faces_tot(), idx;
00143 
00144   update_nu();
00145 // partie vitesses : m2 Rf
00146   for (e = 0; e < zone.nb_elem_tot(); e++) for (i = zone.m2d(e), idx = 0; i < zone.m2d(e + 1); i++, idx++)
00147       for (f = e_f(e, idx), j = zone.m2i(i); f < zone.nb_faces() && ch.icl(f, 0) < 2 && j < zone.m2i(i + 1); j++)
00148         for (fb = e_f(e, zone.m2j(j)), k = zone.rfdeb(fb); k < zone.rfdeb(fb + 1); k++)
00149           matrice(f, nf_tot + zone.rfji(k)) += zone.m2c(j) * ve(e) * (e == f_e(f, 0) ? 1 : -1) * (e == f_e(fb, 0) ? 1 : -1) * pe(e) * zone.rfci(k);
00150 
00151 // partie vorticites : Ra m2 - m1 / nu
00152   for (a = 0; a < (dimension < 3 ? zone.nb_som() : zone.zone().nb_aretes()); a++)
00153     {
00154 // rotationnel : vitesses internes
00155       for (i = ch.radeb(a, 0); i < ch.radeb(a + 1, 0); i++) if (ch.icl(f = ch.raji(i), 0) < 2)
00156           matrice(nf_tot + a, f) += ch.raci(i);
00157 // -m1 / nu
00158       for (i = zone.m1deb(a); i < zone.m1deb(a + 1); i++)
00159         matrice(nf_tot + a, nf_tot + zone.m1ji(i, 0)) -= zone.m1ci(i) / (pe(zone.m1ji(i, 1)) * nu_(zone.m1ji(i, 1), 0));
00160     }
00161 }

00166 void Op_Diff_PolyMAC_Face::contribuer_au_second_membre(DoubleTab& resu) const
00167 {
00168   abort();
00169
